text: The municipal election of the Brazilian city of São Paulo took place on 5 October and 26 October 2008 to elect a Mayor, a Vice Mayor, and 55 City Councillors for the administration of the city. The incumbent Mayor was Gilberto Kassab from the Democrats (DEM), who ran for a reelection. He took office after the resignation of José Serra, who ran for Governor of São Paulo in 2006. ==Candidates== {| class="wikitable" ! !No. !colspan="2" |Mayor !colspan="2" |Vice Mayor !Party/Coalition
